name: RevealRepublicOutro
_source: speak;Luther;Milord, we can travel north to reach Pelopos.
speak;Luther;Aye. Groups such as theirs have become common,{w}{br}but Pelopos is the first city to have removed their duke.
speak;Luther;Not necessarily.{w} The situation will be tense,{w}{br}but I've heard their leaders are pragmatic.
speak;Simon;I see.{w} Still, I'll tell everyone to prepare, just in case.
